title: Textile
medium:
Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: plain compound weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 40.6 x 10.5 cm (16 in. x 4 1/8 in.)
description: Dark blue ground with patterning in green and yellow silk, with bronze colored metal wrapped paper threads. Large scale pattern with geometric lattice work, large floriated roundel, flowers, and small clouds. The large roundel at right is incomplete, but contains interlocking rings.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile.
Medium: silk, paper with applied gold foil
Technique: plain compound weave. Gift of Miss Beatrice Kates. 1940-4-11.
